actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Clerk of the House to inform the President that the House of Representatives has elected Thomas P. O'Neill, Jr., a Representative from the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, Speaker; and Benjamin J. Guthrie, a citizen of the Commonwealth of Virginia, Clerk.

summary.text: Notifies the President that for the 98th Congress the House of Representatives has elected Thomas P. O'Neill, Junior, as Speaker of the House and Benjamin J. Guthrie as Clerk of the House.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Clerk of the House to inform the President that the House of Representatives has elected Thomas P. O'Neill, Jr., a Representative from the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, Speaker; and Benjamin J. Guthrie, a citizen of the Commonwealth of Virginia, Clerk.
